predicate.note: Frames file for 'reimpose' based on transformation of frames for 'impose.'

example.name: all args
example.text: Among other reasons, high fees *trace* regulators reimposed *trace* on certain transfers of thrift deposits to commercial banks ``substantially altered the economics of the transaction for both parties,'' Poughkeepsie said.
example.arg: certain transfers of thrift deposits to commercial banks

example.name: no 'benefactive'
example.text: Market Order: This is probably the most widely used order -- and -- the one most open to abuse by unscrupulous floor brokers, since it -- reimposes no price restrictions.

example.name: agent and 'benefactive'
example.text: John always reimposes on Mary's good will.
